name: Farmhouse
effect: Plant 2 G in adj Field on Forage

name: Mineshaft
effect: Plant 2 S in adj Mtn on Forage

name: Log Cabin
effect: Plant 2 W in adj Forest on Forage

name: Warehouse
effect: Store extra resources here to harvest one at a time later

name: Kitchen
production: 1 F -> 1 Fi or 1 Br + 1 Sa + 1 Fi -> 1 Fe

name: Forge
effect: Can move one improvement on Build

name: Fishery
effect: Plant 2 F in adj Water on Forage

name: Manufactory
effect: Build an additional improvement on Build

name: Laboratory
effect: Plant 1 T1 Resource anywhere on Forage

name: Goldsmith
effect: Plant 1 Ge in Desert on Forage
